name: Sauna
description: A private sauna compartment offers luxurious relaxing moments for those staying in NEA Hotel. The sauna has a wall-mounted refrigerator for enjoying cold drinks while sauna-bathing.

name: Hot tub
description: The sauna changing room features access to the building’s private terrace and hot tub in which you can pamper yourself with a luxurious moment.

name: Hiking
description: Magnificent all year round, in the summer you’ll be glad of the shade, whilst in winter you’ll be lured onwards by the bewitching white wonderland. Discover deep, overgrown gorges; majestic, tumbling waterfalls and astonishing views. Hikes take you to truly enchanting, unforgettable places. It’s a hikers’ fantasy land and you’d be cuckoo to miss it.

name: Horse riding
description: Experience the Icelandic horse surrounded by beautiful nature in this 1 1/2 -2 hour riding tour. Perfect for both beginners as well as more experienced riders.

name: Skiing
description: Skiing is becoming increasingly popular in Germany. Climbing snow-covered mountains on your own strength, enjoying the clear view and icy air, and on the descent laying fresh tracks in untouched deep snow is a dream for winter sports enthusiasts.

name: Snowmobile Tour
description: The winter season begins at the beginning of December, when there is enough snow for various winter activities, such as snowmobiling. Take a guided sled tour through the snow to experience a treasured pastime. Choose from tours to suit all levels with options for private groups, families and dual riders. Try a trip with something extra – a meal in a rustic mountain lodge or a nighttime run in the moonlight. Kids are catered for too! Children can try their very own Mini-Z snowmobiles on a specially-designed track
